content:
Craft an item of type: light_blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 33, "index": 19}, {"type": "spectral_arrow", "quantity": 57, "index": 23}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft light blue wool, I need to place light blue dye in the crafting grid and then add white wool to it. Therefore, I will first move the light blue dye to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 33, "index": 19}, {"type": "spectral_arrow", "quantity": 57, "index": 23}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that the light blue dye is in the crafting grid, I will move the white wool to the right of it. This will allow me to craft the light blue wool.
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 33, "index": 19}, {"type": "spectral_arrow", "quantity": 57, "index": 23}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that the light blue wool has been crafted, I will move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
